subject: Best-practices for Test-First Swing development
msgSnippet: Hi, I m about to start some serious Swing development, and I m looking for some resources, tutorial, best-practices for Swing that go in the Test-First-Design,
messageBody:
Hi,

I'm about to start some serious Swing development, and I'm looking
for some resources, tutorial, best-practices for Swing that go in the
Test-First-Design, Smart-Model/thin-UI direction.

I'm not looking for a way to test Swing application (I know about
JFCUnit), but rather for
"how-to" build a Swing app test-first, and
"how-to" build smarter models.


Alain Ravet
